DOC.brief_summary: The study is a single-center, randomized, un-blinded treatment study in which patients (>78 years) with the use off a heart-lung machine were provided into two study arms. Patient wit "precoating" have a filling of the machine with their own blood. In the comparator arm, a standard priming is used.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Different Heart-lung Machine Filling Methods: Precoating Versus Colloidal Fluids
DOC.criteria: Age > 78 years CPB Hb <12 mg/dl Off pump surgery
